flextable(schedule_data) |>
        set_header_labels(
                methods = "Methods Topic",
                applied = "Applied Topic",
                comp = "Computing Topic"
        ) |>
        bold(part = "header") |>
        merge_v(j = ~ Week + applied + applied + comp) |>
        valign(j = ~Week, valign = "center") |>
        align(j = ~Week, align = "center") |>
        hline(i = c(2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11)) |>
        colformat_md() |>
        fix_border_issues() |>
        autofit()
